Package clientGUI

Class ReviewOrdersGUIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • clientGUI.ReviewOrdersGUIController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class ReviewOrdersGUIController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    ReviewOrdersGUIController class is responsible for allowing the shop manager to confirm an order made by a customer that belongs to his shop, he/she does that by selecting the order and then clicking confirm order button.

    Project Name: Zer-Li (Flowers store in Java)

    Version:
    V1.00 2022
    Author:
    Habib Ibrahim, Vitaly Rofman, Ibrahim Daoud, Yosif Hosen

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) void clickedBackBtn​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      clickedBackBtn method directs the manager to the previous GUI -ShopManagerGUI- when he presses the back button
      (package private) void clickedConfirmBtn​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      clickedConfirmBtn method is responsible for that when the manager selects an order and clicks confirm button, the order will be confirmed, it does so by sending the server in order to update DB, after that it deletes the confirmed order from the TableView
      (package private) void clickedOrderDetails​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      click on "Order details" button, shows popup with order data

      • clickedBackBtn

        void clickedBackBtn​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        clickedBackBtn method directs the manager to the previous GUI -ShopManagerGUI- when he presses the back button
        Parameters:

      • clickedConfirmBtn

        void clickedConfirmBtn​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        clickedConfirmBtn method is responsible for that when the manager selects an order and clicks confirm button, the order will be confirmed, it does so by sending the server in order to update DB, after that it deletes the confirmed order from the TableView
        Parameters:
        event - mouse click
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - getting data from DB exception
